name: High Roller (Renx34)
description:
High Roller is an endless runner platformer where you play as Yahtzee as he runs away from a giant bullet. High Roller is the very first game I have ever published publicly and I hope to make many more in the future.

Controls:

'A' and 'D' for left and right respectively.

'SPACEBAR' to jump.

The 2D Platformer Controller that my game uses was developed by: Tarodev.

 https://github.com/Matthew-J-Spencer/Ultimate-2D-Controller

The background music was composed by: David Renda.

 https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

All other art assets and scripts were developed by myself.
